## VFS.mount() method

Mounts another VFS at the specified path.

Constraints/Behavior: - Mount path can be an existing directory or non existing directory. - Changes from child VFS will bubble to host namespace (path is rewritten with mount prefix)

**Signature:**

```typescript
mount(path: string, vfs: VFS): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

path


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The path where to mount the VFS


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

vfs


</td><td>

[VFS](doc/markdown/./base.vfs.md)


</td><td>

The VFS instance to mount


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
